head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths STANGER, ABRAHAM M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths STANGER, ABRAHAM M.

block.p: STANGER--Abraham M., beloved husband of Claire Y. Stanger, beloved father of Jordan Stanger, Richard Stanger and Hope Stanger. Beloved grandfather of Nina Stanger, Brad Stanger, Molly Stanger and Nathaniel Stanger, and beloved brother of Melvin Stanger. Funeral services are at Riverside Memorial Chapel, Amsterdam Ave. between 75th and 76th St., on Sunday June 3rd, 9:30 am. In lieu of flowers, donations to American Friends of Alyn for Handicapped Children in Israel, 51 East 42nd St., Suite 308, NY, NY 10017.

STANGER--Abraham M., beloved husband of Claire Y. Stanger, beloved father of Jordan Stanger, Richard Stanger and Hope Stanger. Beloved grandfather of Nina Stanger, Brad Stanger, Molly Stanger and Nathaniel Stanger, and beloved brother of Melvin Stanger. Funeral services are at Riverside Memorial Chapel, Amsterdam Ave. between 75th and 76th St., on Sunday June 3rd, 9:30 am. In lieu of flowers, donations to American Friends of Alyn for Handicapped Children in Israel, 51 East 42nd St., Suite 308, NY, NY 10017.
